Tigerhawk: he in trouble again ::runs and rams Liono out the way of Dark One 
Gun fire:: What goes up must come down sad but true ::Gets hit be 3 of  
darkones blast::
 
Liono: ::ducks under grenade Looks at nemesis:: damn that hurt ::Folds his 
wings over to protect form counter fire gets knocked back to his knees behind 
tigerhawk::
On 3 I want you to move behind me 3

Tigerhawk: ::Flips back behind Liono and starts to jester creating to medium 
size Balls of blue energy aims and fires them as the grow closer the Break up 
into 6 little seeking energy balls that explode on contact with the 
Oblitercons::

Liono: Burning Geyser ::liono eyes turn blue raise his arm into the air and 
slams his fist into the earth send a small red line on the ground towards 
darkone the earth beneath him starts develop a small crack and a blue blast 
Erupts under him engulfing DarkOne in a blue energy blast:: That's a Light 
attack hot or would you like me to turn up the heat
